name: Executive Dysfunction
description:
Content warning: Ableism, strong negative self talk

A teeny contemplation about not being able to accomplish simple tasks that are physically easy for you, that you've done before without issue, and that you really need to get done. A frustration simulation with an attempt to make peace with it all by the end. Did I make this while avoiding other time-sensitive responsibilities? It is tax season, draw your own conclusions.

Use the arrow keys to move and advance dialogue boxes.

Made with Bitsy by Adam Le Doux
